sense.name: the process of thawing frozen liquid
sense.examples: The spring melt occurred late this year. The power failure caused the melt of the ice cream in the freezer.

sense.name: an amount of thawed liquid
sense.commentary: MELT[+quantity][+amount][+of_liquid][+thawed] Note: relates to Sense 1, but refers to an amount of liquid, rather than the activity of thawing
sense.examples: The melt from that snowpack has increased this year. There was less melt recorded on glaciers in Antarctica than in earlier years.

sense.name: a hot sandwich with melted cheese
sense.examples: Tom ordered a tuna melt with french fries. Today's special is a patty melt with caramelized onions and gruyere cheese.
